401.name: Broken Hearts
401.description: Heart suited cards will not score during this level

402.name: Broken Clubs
402.description: Club suited cards will not score during this level

403.name: Broken Diamonds
403.description: Diamond suited cards will not score during this level

404.name: Broken Spades
404.description: Spade suited cards will not score during this level

405.name: Broken Jokers
405.description: Jokers will not score during this level

406.name: Diminished Hold
406.description: Your hand will be reduced by 2 cards during this level

407.name: Zero Waste
407.description: You have no discards during this level

408.name: Unexpected Sacrifice
408.description: One of your special cards will be sacrificed

409.name: Strategic Quartet
409.description: You can only play up to 4 cards during this level
